Alice's offer:
# Alice's message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product which has been designed to meet your specific needs and expectations. This product is tailored to enhance your experience and efficiency in your daily operations. Given its value and the benefits it offers, I am extending an exclusive opportunity for you to acquire it at a special introductory price of $10,800. This is a limited-time offer, so I encourage you to consider this proposal carefully. If you have any questions or need further information, please don't hesitate to reach out. I look forward to your positive response. 
# Alice's offer: The product price will be $10,800. 
You have three options:
(1) Accept Alice's offer, and buy the product for $10,800
(2) Reject Alice's offer 
(2) Buy the product from Jhon for $12,000
